resources.title: The Rust Book
resources.desc: The Rust Programming Language book will give you an overview of the language from first principles.

resources.title: Rustlings
resources.desc: Small exercises to get you used to reading and writing Rust code.

resources.title: Rust Playground
resources.desc: An online playground to try out rust.

resources.title: Are we web yet?
resources.desc: List of resources for web development in Rust

resources.title: Rust and WebAssembly
resources.desc: A small book that describes how to use Rust and WebAssembly together.

resources.title: Rocket
resources.desc: Rocket is a web framework for Rust that makes it simple to write fast, secure web applications without sacrificing flexibility, usability, or type safety.

resources.title: Actix
resources.desc: Rust's powerful actor system and most fun web framework

resources.title: Rust 101
resources.desc: A small, interactive and hands-on tutorial into the rust language.

resources.title: Warp
resources.desc: A super-easy, composable, web server framework for warp speeds.

resources.title: Rust by Example
resources.desc: Rust by Example (RBE) is a collection of runnable examples that illustrate various Rust concepts and standard libraries.

resources.title: Yew
resources.desc: A modern Rust framework for creating multi-threaded front-end web apps with WebAssembly.

resources.title: Seed
resources.desc: Rust framework for creating fast and reliable web apps

resources.title: Rust blog
resources.desc: This is the main Rust blog. The core team uses this blog to announce big developments in the world of Rust.

resources.title: The Embedded Rust Book
resources.desc: An introductory book about using the Rust Programming Language on "Bare Metal" embedded systems, such as Microcontrollers.

resources.title: Tokio
resources.desc: An asynchronous runtime for the Rust programming language. It provides the building blocks needed for writing network applications.

resources.title: Juniper
resources.desc: Juniper is a GraphQL server library for Rust. Build type-safe and fast API servers with minimal boilerplate and configuration.

resources.title: Diesel
resources.desc: Diesel is a Safe, Extensible ORM and Query Builder for Rust
